hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Automation_branch
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the name of the Selenium Automation branch

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Marketplace
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Select cloud provider from its marketplace the image has to be pulled

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Number_of_Azure_nodes
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter total number of instances (ACI) to be created in Azure

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Number_of_Aws_nodes
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter total number of instances (ECS) to be created in Aws

flow-definition.script:
// Manually pulled from git based on configurations pipeline { agent { node { label 'build_slave' } } environment { BUILD_NAME = "DMAP Marketplace Deployment" NOTIFYUSERS = 'dsuresh@newtglobalcorp.com' BUILD_DETAILS = "
Job Name: ${env.JOB_NAME}
Build Number: ${env.BUILD_NUMBER}
Build URL: ${BUILD_URL}" } parameters { string(name: 'Automation_branch', defaultValue: 'DevTeam', description: 'Enter the name of the Selenium Automation branch') choice(name: 'Marketplace', choices: ['Azure', 'AWS','Both'], description: 'Select cloud provider from its marketplace the image has to be pulled') string(name: 'Number_of_Azure_nodes', defaultValue: '', description: 'Enter total number of instances (ACI) to be created in Azure') string(name: 'Number_of_Aws_nodes', defaultValue: '', description: 'Enter total number of instances (ECS) to be created in Aws') } options { timestamps() timeout(time: 12, unit: 'HOURS') buildDiscarder(logRotator(numToKeepStr: '10')) } stages { stage ("Checkout Code") { steps { deleteDir() dir("automation"){ deleteDir() echo "Checkout automation code" git branch: "${params.Automation_branch}", credentialsId: 'Kavya_1709', url: 'https://github.com/newtglobalgit/DMAP_QA_Automation.git' } } } stage ("Subscribe and Deploy") { steps { echo "Subscribing and Deploying DMAP" dir("automation") { echo "Updating user inputs in ./src/main/resources/Configuration/Config.properties" sh 'sed -i "s/Marketplace=Azure/Marketplace=$Marketplace/g" ./src/main/resources/Configuration/Config.properties' sh 'sed -i "s/AzureNoOfNodes=4/AzureNoOfNodes=$Number_of_Azure_nodes/g" ./src/main/resources/Configuration/Config.properties' sh 'sed -i "s/AWSNoOfNodes=4/AWSNoOfNodes=$Number_of_Aws_nodes/g" ./src/main/resources/Configuration/Config.properties' sh 'chmod +x ./Drivers/chromedriver' echo "Starting script" sh "mvn clean test -Dsurefire.suiteXmlFiles=./src/test/resources/TestNG/AutoDeployment_Azure.xml" echo "Completed successfully executing automation script" } } } } post { always { emailext subject: "Jenkins Job Report For ${BUILD_NAME} - ${currentBuild.currentResult}", body: "BUILD DETAILS: ${BUILD_DETAILS}
BUILD STATUS: ${currentBuild.currentResult}", to: "${NOTIFYUSERS}" } }}
